response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1,500,000, but considering its importance to you, we aim to make it accessible. We are offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving for you and ensures you secure an asset worth far more than the investment. We believe this offer presents a unique chance for both of us to benefit from this transaction. Please let us know if you wish to proceed.", "product_price": 1200000}
